services.otherRequestsDescription: If you have a project not listed above, feel free to contact me. I can handle a wide range of projects using my skills and experience. Please start by getting in touch.

profile.introduction: AI-driven full stack engineer with a passion for beautiful code and user-friendly design. Skilled in a wide range of tasks including UI/UX design. Always striving for efficiency and quality. Currently learning English and Korean.

0.title: Born in Hiroshima
0.description: Born in Hiroshima City, a place rich in history and culture. Grew up with curiosity in an environment where nature and technology coexist.

1.title: Specialized Education in Chemistry
1.description: Fascinated by chemistry, chose a technical high school chemistry course. Acquired experimental and analytical skills, logical thinking, and scientific approach. Obtained several certifications and deepened expertise.

2.title: Career Start at Chemical Plant
2.description: Applied knowledge and skills at a local chemical plant. Engaged in quality control and process optimization, realizing the importance of data analysis and teamwork.

3.title: Awakening to the Digital World
3.description: Inspired by data analysis at the plant, became fascinated by programming. Started self-study using online resources, coding late into the night.

4.title: Seeking Systematic Learning
4.description: Joined a programming school for systematic knowledge and skills in web development. Broadened perspective through competition with peers.

5.title: Period of Stagnation and Introspection
5.description: After graduation, faced a period of uncertainty and introspection, which became an opportunity to reconsider true aspirations.

6.title: Decision and Career Change
6.description: After much deliberation, decided to leave the chemical plant to pursue a passion for programming, stepping into a new path with both anxiety and hope.

7.title: Balancing Study and Life
7.description: Continued programming studies while working part-time, steadily improving skills.

8.title: Retry - Full-Fledged Engineer Training
8.description: Re-enrolled in a programming school for advanced practical curriculum, focusing on modern tech stack and team development.

9.title: Steady Growth and Confidence
9.description: Graduated with clear growth and confidence, improving problem-solving and communication skills.

10.title: First Professional Experience - Investment Info Service
10.description: Participated in a project for investor information services, handling design and implementation of new features using Vue.js, and learning professional development processes.

11.title: Challenge and Trial for Independence
11.description: Sought projects via crowdsourcing and agents, gaining valuable experience despite initial setbacks, clarifying direction for self-improvement.

12.title: First Project - Automated Management System
12.description: Joined a web automation service project as a frontend engineer, handling UI/UX design and implementation, optimizing state management, and building CI/CD pipelines.

13.title: Planning and Development of Web Card Game
13.description: Handled everything from planning and UI/UX design to frontend and backend integration, overcoming technical challenges and focusing on creating an intuitive and enjoyable game experience.

creations.title: Works & Creations
creations.description: A collection of works and creations developed individually.

1.title: E-commerce Platform
1.subtitle: Full Stack Web Application
1.description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform with payment features, user authentication, product management, cart, and checkout.

2.title: Fitness Tracker
2.subtitle: Cross-Platform Mobile App
2.description: A mobile app for tracking workouts and nutrition, offering customizable plans, meal logs, and progress charts.

3.title: Portfolio Website
3.subtitle: Responsive Web Design
3.description: A modern, interactive portfolio website featuring smooth animations and responsive design.

4.title: 2D Platformer Game
4.subtitle: Browser-based Game Development
4.description: A retro-style 2D platformer game built with HTML5 and JavaScript, featuring multiple levels, enemies, and power-ups.

5.title: 3D Character Model
5.subtitle: 3D Modeling & Animation
5.description: A high-poly character model for game development, rigged and animated, exportable to various game engines.

6.title: SaaS Product Landing Page
6.subtitle: Conversion-Optimized Design
6.description: A performance-focused landing page for a SaaS product, optimized UI/UX for maximum conversion.
